text: Anthony Samuel Selby (26 February 1938 - 5 September 2021) was an English actor. He was born in Lambeth, London, England. His career began in 1956. He played Sabalom Glitz in Doctor Who between 1986 until 1987. He played Salter in the 1968 movie Witchfinder General. He was also in Mulberry, Get Some In! and EastEnders. Selby died on 5 September 2021 in London at the age of 83.Sitcom star Tony Selby dies aged 83 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from London Category:People from the London Borough of Lambeth
title: Tony Selby
